EntryName_sub1_en: 0 = good, 1 = slightly suspect, 2 = highly suspect, 3 = bad

EntryName_en: 4-bit indicator of quality control class according to GTSPP
EntryName_sub1_en: 0 = Unqualified, 1 = Correct value (all checks passed), 2 = Probably good but value inconsistent with statistics (differ from climatology), 3 = Probably bad (spike, gradient, ... if other tests passed), 4 = Bad value, impossible value (out of scale, vertical instability, constant profile), 5 = Value modified during quality control, 6-7 = Not used (reserved), 8 = Interpolated value, 9 = Missing value

EntryName_en: 0 = Not suspected, 1 = Suspected, 2 = Reserved, 3 = Information not required
0 = Data present, good, collocated, 1 = Data available but of degraded quality and not used, 2 = No spatiotemporally collocated data available, 3-14 = Not used (reserved), 15 = Missing value
